column1: Metabotropic glutamate receptor-mediated long-term depression (mGluR-LTD) is a form of synaptic plasticity that is dysregulated in multiple mouse models of autism, including fragile X syndrome and tuberous sclerosis. Overall design: Ribosome profiling and RNA-seq of hippocampal slices from wild-type mice before and after DHPG-mGluR stimulation
